meta_description: American art and exhibitions. Stunning architecture. 120 acres of Ozark nature. General admission is always free.
hours_text:
###### [Ver esta página en español](https://crystalbridges.org/plan-a-visit/seasonal-highlights/lo-mejor-de-cada-estacion/)

## Plan your perfect visit in any season

Experience Crystal Bridges through the seasons! No matter when you visit, there’s always plenty to see, do, and explore.

To help you make the most of your time at the museum, we’ve prepared **visitor’s guides for each season** highlighting some of our favorite exhibitions, outdoor experiences, and ways to enjoy your time surrounded by art, architecture, and nature.

### Visitor’s Guides by Season

### Spring Guide

[ Spring Guide ](https://crystalbridges.org/plan-a-visit/seasonal-highlights/cb-spring-guide/)

### Summer Guide

[ Summer Guide ](https://crystalbridges.org/plan-a-visit/seasonal-highlights/cb-summer-guide/)

### Fall Guide

[ Fall Guide ](https://crystalbridges.org/plan-a-visit/seasonal-highlights/cb-fall-guide/)

### Winter Guide

[ Winter Guide ](https://crystalbridges.org/plan-a-visit/seasonal-highlights/cb-winter-guide/)

_Ready to head to the museum?[Check out our Plan a Visit page](https://crystalbridges.org/plan-a-visit/) for hours, parking info, and more, or [explore our calendar](https://crystalbridges.org/calendar/) and see what’s on._
